update irl_fee_mapping
FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_RULE = #{branchRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_TYPE_RULE = #{eventTypeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_TYPE_RULE = #{tranTypeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_GROUP_RULE = #{prodGroupRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_TYPE_RULE = #{prodTypeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URGENT_FLAG_RULE = #{urgentFlagRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LOCAL_RULE = #{isLocalRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_RULE = #{areaRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCY_RULE = #{ccyRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLIENT_TYPE_RULE = #{clientTypeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_TYPE_RULE = #{categoryTypeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE_TYPE_RULE = #{sourceTypeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_TYPE_RULE = #{docTypeRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_STATUS_RULE = #{oldStatusRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_STATUS_RULE = #{newStatusRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RULE = #{isRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_RULE = #{companyRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ID_RULE = #{serviceIdRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where IRL_SEQ_NO = #{irlSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:

DOC_TYPE_RULE,
OLD_STATUS_RULE,
NEW_STATUS_RULE,
IS_RULE,
COMPANY_RULE,
SERVICE_ID_RULE,
COLUMN_STATUS,
